Articles.Content:
I take my now mod blocked derailment and knock your moon out of orbit with it, shattering both into pieces.

My remnants of a very convoluted mess of a story

Oh hey.

Did you guys forget about the Gespenst?

My shattered hill. And my Gespenst, which you literally cannot take from me. The Gespenst, I mean. The hill you can try to.

/ban gespenst

/claim hill

okay mah hill!

I decide to be a jerk and cast [Fated Retribution](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=378383), and [Sudden Spoiling](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=389698). Needless to say no one survives...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-29T21:02:46Z" title="05/29/2015 09:02  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 29, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

I call upon Vanamonde to ban Xannari Ferrows from the game for use of copyrighted Wizards of the Coast content.

MY hill!

I build a massive rocket under your hill without you noticing and launch it to space.

My space hill.

I increase the atmospheric drag on your hill in ever so small increments. 

My violently reentering hill.

I built hidden re-entry shields with parachutes inside the hill aswell.

My safe hill.

I tweak the thermal model beyond your limits.

My burnt dirt.

I HyperEdit your burnt dirt to Eeloo, where it freezes and becomes un-burnt.

My un-burnt dirt.
I uninstall your mods. My useless data.
I update to the next version of the game which has the mods installed by default, my save game
ModuleManager says no, and it's mine.

Guess what time it is!

That's right... GESPENST TIME!
I decide to walk past the rubble that was a regular day, and reactivate the argos. my starship.

I upgrade your starship to Windows 8, making you feel disgusted towards the ship and leave it. I then take control over it and downgrade it to Windows 7.

My starship.

I downgrade your Windows 7 to Windows Vista, leaving you disgusted with it before finally downgrading to the superior Windows XP.

My Windows XP.

NaNo virus.

Nobody's anything anymore.

Security Packs.

My nothing.

Supply drops.

My hill.

I dig the bottom of your hill, put it in a truck, and drive away to Urmum (A planet yet to be discovered).

My intergalactic hill. 

FRIED CHICKEN
I bulldoze the hill to make room for an intergalactic highway. My highway or the highway.

i places rain snow and ice on your highway for years wairing it down intill its a pothole filled mess then i take over

my road network
I use my intergalactic snowplows to get rid of your snow. My clean intergalactic highway.

I explain why the laws of physics would prevent such an object from existing.

I still claim the NaNo virus as my own.
